text: Xinghua Prefecture () was a Song dynasty military prefecture created in 979, under the administration of Fujian Circuit. It was abolished by the Mongol Yuan dynasty in 1277. Its administrative area is roughly modern Putian and Xianyou County. ==References== * Category:979 establishments Category:10th- century establishments in China Category:1277 disestablishments in Asia Category:13th-century disestablishments in China Category:Prefectures of the Song dynasty Category:Former prefectures in Fujian
title: Xinghua Prefecture
